title: As he lay on his bed...

replies.body:
Possess all three skins, the champions for 25% off, and Omen of the Damned for 1 RP.

We can get all that for 1RP? :D
Honor the typo, Rito.
Its not a type. Learn to comprehension.
Probably should have checked yourself, because you wrecked yourself with that typo.

<------the joke

()<------your head
Those are two parenthesis, my head is currently attached to my shoulders.
You guys do realize that this guy is joking 100%, right?
I laughed, you laughed,  {{champion:56}} laughed, we both died... Good times
OMG ZEDIMENTAL GOOD TO SEE YOU HERE
Attempted to purchase for 1 RP, was denied by store, am disappoint.
lol
these skins just remind me of dark souls....{{item:3041}}
I was thinking Bloodborne.
Same thing
Same thing as far as a lot of core gameplay elements, yeah, but as far as aesthetic goes they look much more like Bloodborne.
new singed skin aka doctor from assassins creed brotherhood
aka the plague doctors from when the plague ran rampant in europe. 1347-1750 AD.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
that is a lot of attack damage
did your name really cost 1300 rp just asking

I love it when people are like "hey this is from this videogame!" when it's actually a historical thing, like one time my buddy was telling me how Zeus is this character in God of War and he's telling me the story of the game and im like "you know it's based off of greek mythology right?" his reply was "greek what?" ....
This hurts me.
In the words of Professor Farnsworth...I don't want to live on this planet anymore...
It was actually correct the first time. Your "correction" is incorrect.
i know. However, those 3 years were the deadliest and killed 1/3 of europe's population
Your time range is 4 years though, not 3 years.

Possess all three skins, the champions for 25% off, and Omen of the Damned for 1 RP. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Guess this is {{champion:202}} version of A Christmas Carol.
Some would say that is wrong, because there are only 3 spirits. I say that is what makes it Jhin's biggest nightmare.

{{champion:111}} Twitch the new skins are out! Where is he?

{{champion:45}} In his room crying.

{{champion:111}} Why?

{{champion:45}} Something about the new skins being plague based and him getting rejected yet being tilted as the plague rat, and the fact most of his skins are the legacy vault.

{{champion:111}} Oh please I only got 3 and you don't see me crying about it.

{{champion:45}} You got mad about not having an anchor man skin.

{{champion:111}} I CAN HAVE DREAMS!*starts crying*

{{champion:29}} KEEP IT DOWN CRYING TO CRY HERE! Why does nothing good happen to me.

{{champion:2}} What's with all the noise and why is there water reaching my knees.

{{champion:45}} Nautilus is crying cause I brought up the anchor man skin, and Twitch is crying cause he got rejected from the new skin line.

{{champion:2}} Oh that's why those guys were here yesterday asking for Twitch.

{{champion:45}} They came here, why didn't they stay.

{{champion:2}} I thought they came to kill him so I started attacking them and one is in the intensive care unit, but I think Twitch will under stand. *gets shot* Ooooow maybe not!
CAN WE PLEASE HAVE AN ANCHORMAN NAUTILUS? GIVE HIM A BURGUNDY SUIT AND THE MUSTACHE!
Would much rather have a shovel knight Nautilus

{{champion:29}}  KEEP IT DOWN CRYING TO CRY HERE! Why does nothing good happen to me.


https://i.ytimg.com/vi/zrfUJzfMZ_4/maxresdefault.jpg

Durning the time of the Black Plague doctors wore what singed is wearing and hallucinations would happen t=from the disease and drugs making patients have hallucenations like nocturne until they died and a holy spirit came to guide them on their way I.E. Kayle.
this guy knows his stuffs
Oh look, it's time for the Harrowing... FINALLY
why not make {{champion:27}} 's poison black?

It would be too hard to see the trail, especially if it went through the fog and you couldn't see it. Maybe if it was tinted with a green around it like flies and their smell or something to distinguish.
I gotta admit I'm not a big fan of these skins but that splash art is amazing!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

That plague doctor icon...

I have a mighty NEED {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
These are actually so cool and I love the concept, please riot expand on this further.
I remember when that Singed skin was a initially created by a player... forever ago. Do they get any sort of reward for that? Even just RP or whatever?
This bundle is pointless if you own the champions.  That really sucks riot.  If you own all the champs, you shouldn't be punished or get the short end of the stick!  Awesome skins thou!!!
Well well, Singed. A hoonter must hoont. {{champion:27}}

As a {{champion:56}} main, I am pleased.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Yeah, he really needed a new skin. I just started playing him and was saying how bad the ones he had are. I am quite happy about this.

> [{quoted}](name=Lydia in Doorway,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=5zFdiJT6,comment-id=00320000,timestamp=2016-05-06T10:24:16.632+0000)
>
> Yeah, he really needed a new skin. I just started playing him and was saying how bad the ones he had are. I am quite happy about this.

Well, Eternum is hands-down his best skin, but I really adore Void. Haunting is only good for the particles.
I've been hoping to get lucky and get the void skin from a crate. It's not available anymore.  I'd like to see a Freddy Kruger skin one day.
